mapper.select: select board_idx, title, hit_cnt, date_format(created_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_dt from t_board where deleted_yn = 'N' order by board_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(title, contents, creator_id, created_dt) values (#{title}, #{contents}, 'admin', now())

insert into t_file ( board_idx, original_file_name, stored_file_path, file_size, creator_id, created_dt ) values
( #{item.boardIdx}, #{item.originalFileName}, #{item.storedFilePath}, #{item.fileSize}, 'admin', now() )
mapper.select: select idx, board_idx, original_file_name, format(round(file_size/1024), 0) as file_size from t_file where board_idx = #{boardIdx} and deleted_yn = 'N'
select original_file_name, stored_file_path, file_size from t_file where idx = #{idx} and board_idx = #{boardIdx} and deleted_yn = 'N'
select board_idx, title, hit_cnt, contents, creator_id, date_format(created_dt, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_dt from t_board where deleted_yn = 'N' and board_idx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.delete: update t_board set deleted_yn = 'Y' , updated_dt = now() , updator_id = 'admin' where board_idx = #{boardIdx}
